exercises.name: Burpee
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart
Drop into a squat and place hands on the floor
Jump or step feet back into a plank position
Perform a push-up (optional)
Jump or step feet forward to hands
Explosively jump up with arms overhead
Land softly and immediately begin next rep
cues: Keep core tight throughout
Land softly on the balls of your feet
Maintain a flat back in plank position

exercises.name: Burpee (No Push-Up)
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart
Drop into a squat and place hands on the floor
Jump or step feet back into a plank position
Immediately jump or step feet forward to hands
Explosively jump up with arms overhead
Land softly and immediately begin next rep
cues: Keep core engaged in plank
Move quickly between positions
Control your breathing

exercises.name: Burpee (No Jump)
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart
Drop into a squat and place hands on the floor
Step feet back into a plank position
Perform a push-up (optional)
Step feet forward to hands
Stand up tall and reach arms overhead
Lower arms and repeat
cues: Step back one foot at a time for control
Keep core tight throughout
Great low-impact alternative

exercises.name: Mountain Climbers
instructions: Start in a high plank position with hands under shoulders
Drive one knee toward your chest
Quickly switch legs, driving the other knee forward
Continue alternating legs at a rapid pace
Keep hips level and core engaged throughout
cues: Keep your back flat, not piked
Drive knees straight forward, not out to the side
Maintain steady breathing

exercises.name: Bear Crawl
instructions: Start on all fours with knees hovering 1-2 inches off the ground
Move forward by stepping opposite hand and foot together
Keep your back flat and hips low
Continue crawling forward for desired distance
Reverse direction to crawl backward
cues: Keep knees close to the ground
Move opposite hand and foot simultaneously
Engage your core to prevent hip sway

exercises.name: Inchworm
instructions: Stand tall with feet hip-width apart
Hinge at hips and place hands on the floor
Walk hands forward until you reach a plank position
Optionally perform a push-up
Walk feet toward hands keeping legs as straight as possible
Stand up and repeat
cues: Keep legs straight to stretch hamstrings
Engage core in plank position
Move with control, not speed

exercises.name: Sprawl
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart
Drop your hips and place hands on the floor
Kick feet back while dropping hips to the floor
Push up and immediately jump feet forward
Return to standing position
Repeat in a fluid motion
cues: Drop hips low to the ground
Explode back up quickly
Different from burpee - no jump at top

exercises.name: Breakdancer Kicks
instructions: Start in a bear crawl position (hands and feet on floor, knees hovering)
Lift one hand and rotate body while kicking opposite leg through
Extend the kicking leg straight out to the side
Return to starting position
Repeat on the other side
Continue alternating sides
cues: Keep supporting arm strong and stable
Rotate through your core, not just your limbs
Kick leg through with control

exercises.name: Dumbbell Thruster
instructions: Hold dumbbells at shoulder height with palms facing each other
Squat down until thighs are parallel to floor
Drive through heels to stand while pressing dumbbells overhead
Lock out arms at the top
Lower dumbbells back to shoulders as you descend into next squat
cues: Use leg drive to power the press
Keep core tight throughout
One fluid motion from squat to press

exercises.name: Barbell Thruster
instructions: Hold barbell in front rack position (bar on front shoulders)
Squat down until thighs are parallel or below
Drive explosively through heels to stand
Use momentum to press barbell overhead
Lock out arms at the top
Lower bar back to front rack as you descend
cues: Keep elbows high in front rack
Drive through the heels
Seamless transition from squat to press

exercises.name: Kettlebell Thruster
instructions: Hold kettlebells in rack position at shoulders
Squat down keeping chest up
Drive through heels to stand explosively
Press kettlebells overhead as you rise
Lock out arms at the top
Return to rack position and repeat
cues: Keep wrists straight, bells resting on forearms
Use hip drive to initiate the press
Control the descent

exercises.name: Clean and Press
instructions: Start with weight on the floor, feet hip-width apart
Hinge at hips and grip the weight
Explosively extend hips and pull weight to shoulders (clean)
Catch in front rack position with slight knee bend
Press weight overhead to lockout
Lower to shoulders, then back to floor
cues: Pull with your hips, not your arms
Catch the clean with soft knees
Full hip extension before the pull

exercises.name: Kettlebell Swing
instructions: Stand with feet slightly wider than shoulder-width
Hinge at hips and grip kettlebell with both hands
Swing bell back between legs, keeping back flat
Explosively drive hips forward to swing bell to chest height
Let the bell swing back down, hinging at hips
Repeat in a continuous fluid motion
cues: Power comes from the hips, not the arms
Squeeze glutes hard at the top
Keep arms relaxed, shoulders packed

exercises.name: Turkish Get-Up
instructions: Lie on back with kettlebell pressed up in one hand
Bend knee on same side, foot flat on floor
Roll onto opposite elbow, then hand
Bridge hips up high
Sweep back leg through to kneeling lunge
Stand up while keeping weight overhead
Reverse the movement to return to floor
cues: Keep eyes on the weight throughout
Move slowly and with control
Keep the arm locked out at all times

exercises.name: Man Maker
instructions: Start standing with dumbbells at sides
Place dumbbells on floor and jump feet back to plank
Perform a push-up
Row one dumbbell to hip, lower, row the other
Jump feet forward to hands
Clean dumbbells to shoulders
Perform a thruster (squat to overhead press)
Return to start and repeat
cues: Keep hips stable during rows
Control the dumbbells throughout
This is a complex movement - master each part first

exercises.name: Man Maker (No Jump)
instructions: Start standing with dumbbells at sides
Place dumbbells on floor and step feet back to plank
Perform a push-up
Row one dumbbell to hip, lower, row the other
Step feet forward to hands
Clean dumbbells to shoulders
Perform a thruster (squat to overhead press)
Return to start and repeat
cues: Step back one foot at a time
Keep hips stable during rows
Great low-impact alternative

exercises.name: Devil Press
instructions: Start with dumbbells on floor, feet shoulder-width apart
Grip dumbbells and jump feet back to plank
Perform a burpee (chest to floor)
Jump feet forward outside hands
Swing dumbbells back between legs
Explosively swing dumbbells overhead in one motion (like a snatch)
Lower dumbbells to floor and repeat
cues: Use hip power for the swing
Keep arms straight during the swing portion
Land softly from the jump

exercises.name: Dumbbell Snatch
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, dumbbell between feet
Hinge at hips and grip dumbbell with one hand
Explosively extend hips and pull dumbbell up
As dumbbell rises, rotate arm and punch up to catch overhead
Lock out arm at the top
Lower with control and repeat
cues: Drive through the hips, not the arm
Keep the dumbbell close to your body
Punch up to catch, don't swing around

exercises.name: Kettlebell Snatch
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, kettlebell between feet
Hinge at hips and grip kettlebell with one hand
Swing kettlebell back between legs
Explosively drive hips forward and pull kettlebell up
As it rises, punch hand through and catch overhead
Lock out arm, then let it swing back down
cues: Tame the arc - keep the bell close
Punch through at the top to avoid banging wrist
Power comes from the hips

exercises.name: Battle Rope Slams
instructions: Stand facing anchor point with feet shoulder-width apart
Hold one rope end in each hand
Raise both arms overhead
Slam ropes down forcefully while hinging slightly at hips
Immediately raise arms and repeat
Maintain a fast, powerful rhythm
cues: Use your whole body, not just arms
Hinge at hips as you slam down
Create big, powerful waves

exercises.name: Slam Ball Throw
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart holding slam ball
Raise the ball overhead, extending fully
Engage core and slam ball down forcefully
Hinge at hips and follow through with the slam
Pick up the ball and repeat
cues: Throw the ball INTO the ground, not at it
Use your core and lats, not just arms
Squat down to pick up, protect your back

exercises.name: TRX Atomic Push-Up
instructions: Place feet in TRX straps, hands on floor in push-up position
Perform a push-up
At the top, drive knees toward chest (knee tuck)
Extend legs back to plank
Repeat push-up and knee tuck combo
cues: Keep hips level during push-up
Control the knee tuck, don't swing
Engage core throughout entire movement

exercises.name: Wall Ball
instructions: Stand facing wall, arm's length away, holding medicine ball at chest
Squat down until thighs are parallel to floor
Explosively stand and throw ball to target on wall (8-10 feet high)
Catch ball as it returns and immediately descend into next squat
Repeat in continuous motion
cues: Use leg drive to power the throw
Keep chest up during the squat
Catch and absorb into the next squat smoothly
